./gazebo/gui/ViewAngleWidget.cc:177:  double pitch = -std::atan2(_dir.Z(),

./gazebo/rendering/ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:271:  double pitch = -atan2(_vec.Z(), sqrt(pow(_vec.X(), 2) + pow(_vec.Y(), 2)));
./gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.cc:465:      double pitch = atan2(-delta.Z(),
./gazebo/rendering/Camera.cc:380:    double pitch = atan2(-direction.Z(),
./gazebo/rendering/OculusCamera.cc:415:  double pitchAngle = atan2(-dir.z, sqrt(dir.x*dir.x + dir.y*dir.y));
./gazebo/rendering/UserCamera.cc:539:  double pitchAngle = atan2(-dir.Z(), sqrt(dir.X()*dir.X() + dir.Y()*dir.Y()));

Perhaps this could be a helper function somewhere? Ignition math?
